title: María Mercedes Capa Estrada
text: Maria Mercedes Capa Estrada (born August 23, 1980 in <a href="Valladolid">Valladolid</a>) is a <a href="goalball">goalball athlete</a> from <a href="Spain">Spain</a>. She has a disability: she is <a href="Visual%20impairment">blind</a> and a B2 type goalball player. She played goalball at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Paralympics">1996 Summer Paralympics</a>. Her team was third.
